title: Smart Data Models - GovHydroWPID
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Woodward PID Hydro Governor.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be GovHydroWPID

d.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Turbine damping factor (D).  Unit = delta P / delta speed. Default: 0.0

gatmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gate opening Limit Maximum (Gatmax). Default: 0.0

gatmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gate opening Limit Minimum (Gatmin). Default: 0.0

kd.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Derivative gain (Kd).  Typical Value = 1.11. Default: 0.0

ki.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reset gain (Ki).  Typical Value = 0.36. Default: 0.0

kp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Proportional gain (Kp).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

mwbase.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Base for power values  (MWbase) (>0).  Unit = MW. Default: 0.0

pgv1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Output at Gv1 PU of MWbase (Pgv1). Default: 0.0

pgv2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Output at Gv2 PU of MWbase (Pgv2). Default: 0.0

pgv3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Output at Gv3 PU of MWbase (Pgv3). Default: 0.0

pmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum Power Output (Pmax). Default: 0.0

pmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum Power Output (Pmin). Default: 0.0

ta.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Controller time constant (Ta) (>0).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gate servo time constant (Tb) (>0).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

treg.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Speed detector time constant (Treg). Default: 0

tw.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Water inertia time constant (Tw) (>0).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

velmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum gate opening velocity (Velmax).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

velmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum gate closing velocity (Velmin).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0
